aboutPage.title: About MyBook
aboutPage.content1: MyBook is a vintage-style library website dedicated to preserving and sharing various book resources. Our design inspiration comes from 1980s web style, pursuing a simple and practical reading experience.
aboutPage.content2: MyBook's mission is to provide readers with a quiet, focused reading space, away from the hustle and bustle of modern internet. We hope that through the retro design style, readers can找回 the essential pleasure of reading.
aboutPage.content3: The library is currently under construction and will soon include various classic books. If you have any suggestions or cooperation intentions, please contact us.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.content: If you have any questions, suggestions or cooperation intentions, please contact us through the following methods:
